title: How to Change Your Mind (Ep. 379 Update)
description: There are a lot of barriers to changing your mind: ego, overconfidence, inertia — and cost. Politicians who flip-flop get mocked; family and friends who cross tribal borders are shunned. But shouldn’t we be encouraging people to change their minds? And how can we get better at it ourselves?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
